'''Alan Howard''' was an English actor. He was the voice for both [[Sauron]] and his [[One Ring]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King|The Return of the King]]''.
